snippet: For the recently divorced man, the process of renesting can be daunting, but it also offers an opportunity to unleash your hidden bachelor.
abstract: Items and accessories that recently divorced men may need when decorating their new homes suggested.
lead_paragraph: For the recently divorced man, the process of renesting can be daunting, but it also offers an opportunity to unleash your hidden bachelor.

headline.seo: Accessories for the Man Who Has Nothing
